I found a crack on another site for this release.

Download this file, and run the Phoenix.exe.
Then go to Instrument>Update Content>Internet
After update, go to Instrument>SID Unpacker
Select the sid file from your DVD1 .iso, and unpack which language you'd like installed.
When asked, mount DVD2 and press continue.
Apply the crack which is included in the file and game on!

@ everyone who try to install with Pheonix

Follow these instructions.

Run the Phoenix.exe.
Then go to Instrument>Update Content>Internet
After update, go to Instrument>SID Unpacker
Mount DVD1.iso and DVD2.iso in two different viritual units.
Select the sid file from your DVD1 .iso, and unpack which language you'd like installed.
When asked, select sid file from DVD2 and press continue.
Apply the crack from Razor and game on!

PLEASE HELP ME WITH PRODUCT CODE of the game

you install it there will be TWO Napoleon TW folders if you didn't change any default names while installing one will be Razor>Napoleon Total War which will have like one file in it. disregard that and refresh your "Program Files" and look for Napoleon Total War(i refreshed the name order in the file & the file itself). that Napoleon Total war should have a couple of .dll files in it and a few folders, go to Disc 1 and find the Razor folder that has "Data and a .exe file" copy paste that and put it in the Napoleon Total War and you should be able to play it.

if these did not help you then either you're beyond retarded or the game is just not made for your system.
